body_html:
Not yet, but I will try that now...
(been playing with it, haven't gotten that far, hard to tell where the issue is, seems like in the calculation of the gradients)

Also if I flip the values, make x = y and y = x it works fine, calculates a X and b weights just fine... so this almost certainly means it is the solver which is sadly very far from robust...

body:
Not yet, but I will try that now...
(been playing with it, haven't gotten that far, hard to tell where the issue is, seems like in the calculation of the gradients)

Also if I flip the values,  make x = y and y = x it works fine, calculates a X and b weights just fine...  so this almost certainly means it is the solver which is sadly very far from robust...
